item.title: UltraTech buys 8.69% stake from Star Cement promoter group for ₹851 crore - CNBCTV18
item.description:
UltraTech buys 8.69% stake from Star Cement promoter group for ₹851 crore

Date: Dec 27, 2024
Source: CNBC TV18

In a notable move in the cement industry, UltraTech Cement Ltd. has acquired an 8.69% stake in Star Cement Ltd. from its promoter group for ₹851 crore.

  • UltraTech acquired the shares at ₹235 per share.
  • This stake is a non-controlling minority stake in Star Cement.
  • Star Cement, based in Meghalaya, reported a turnover of ₹2,910 crore in FY 2024.
  • UltraTech recently also acquired a 32.72% stake in India Cements, making it a subsidiary.
  • Star Cement boasts a 7.7 MTPA grinding capacity and a 26.5% market share in the north-eastern market.
  • The company is planning a ₹380 crore capex for the second half of FY 2024.
“The blocks are estimated to have geological limestone reserves of 63.9 million tonnes.”

This acquisition indicates UltraTech's ongoing strategy of consolidation in the cement sector.

item.title: Manmohan Singh death: Are banks, schools closed today (December 27)? Check details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Manmohan Singh Death: Impact on Schools and Banks in India

Date: December 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh passed away at the age of 92. The Union government declared seven days of mourning, but so far, only Karnataka has officially declared a holiday for schools and colleges.

  • The Union Cabinet will meet on December 27 to pay tribute to Manmohan Singh.
  • National Flag will be at half-mast with no official entertainment during the mourning period.
  • No official announcement yet on bank closures on December 27; digital banking services will remain operational.
  • Karnataka has declared a holiday for schools and colleges.
  • Awaiting announcements from other states regarding educational institutions.
“History will be kinder to me than the media.” - Manmohan Singh

This event marks a significant moment in Indian history, as it affects political rituals and public observance nationwide.

item.title: Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli’s wedding photographer says the picture featuring the couple’s forehead ki - The Times of India
item.description:
Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli’s Wedding Photographer Shares Favorite Photo

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's wedding in Italy on December 11, 2017, continues to enchant fans. Their wedding photographer, Joseph Radhik, recently shared insights about his favorite photograph from the ceremony during a Reddit AMA.

  • The photo features a black and white image of Virat kissing Anushka on her forehead.
  • Joseph described the photograph as looking posed but being “100% documentary.”
  • He expressed his joy while capturing the moment.
  • The couple is also in the news for planning to move to London permanently after their second child is born.
“It was a photo of Anushka and Virat on their wedding day. In black and white, with him kissing her on her forehead. This is easily my favourite photo because it looks posed, but is 100% documentary.” - Joseph Radhik

This cherished moment highlights not only the couple's love but also the artistry of wedding photography, preserving intimate moments that resonate with fans even years later.

item.title: Ricky Ponting blasts ICC for letting Virat Kohli go easily for Sam Konstas act; Gavaskar calls it ‘slap on the wrist’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ricky Ponting blasts ICC for letting Virat Kohli go easily for Sam Konstas act; Gavaskar calls it ‘slap on the wrist’

Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Ricky Ponting has openly criticized the ICC for what he perceives to be a lenient punishment for Virat Kohli after a physical altercation during a Boxing Day Test.

  • Ponting argues that Kohli's 20% match fee fine is insufficient given the seriousness of the incident.
  • Kohli was sanctioned for a shoulder bump against debutant Sam Konstas, classified as a Level 1 offence.
  • Legendary cricketer Sunil Gavaskar also supports the view that the penalty is inadequate, calling it a ‘slap on the wrist’.
  • Ponting emphasizes Kohli's role as a role model and believes stricter consequences are warranted.
  • The incident raises concerns over the message sent to younger players regarding acceptable conduct.
“That’s a slap on the wrist. All these players are highly paid professionals. Any fines will have to be a deterrent.” – Sunil Gavaskar

The opinions expressed highlight the need for the ICC to enforce stronger disciplinary measures to maintain standards in professional cricket.

item.title: Astronauts Share Most Breathtaking Images of Earth From Space in 2024 - ScienceAlert
item.description:
Astronauts Capture Stunning Images of Earth from Space in 2024

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Business Insider

This article features impressive images taken by astronauts from the International Space Station (ISS) throughout 2024, showcasing the beauty and fragility of our planet.

  • Astronauts take hundreds of photos from space each year.
  • Images include breathtaking views of natural phenomena such as the aurora borealis and comet sightings.
  • The overview effect profoundly impacts astronauts, altering their perspective on Earth.
  • Upcoming plans for astronauts to return to Earth via SpaceX’s Crew Dragon after a prolonged stay on the ISS.
“How would you not want to take pictures and try and share that with the rest of humanity?” - NASA Astronaut Matt Dominick

As the ISS approaches the end of its operational life, its legacy continues to inspire a sense of unity among nations.

item.title: WHO chief Tedros narrowly escapes bombardment at Yemen's Sanaa airport - Hindustan Times
item.description:
WHO Chief Tedros Survives Bombardment at Yemen's Sanaa Airport

Date: Dec 27, 2024 06:48 AM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

World Health Organization (WHO) Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus narrowly escaped an aerial bombardment at Sanaa International Airport in Yemen, which resulted in the deaths of at least two individuals.

  • Tedros and colleagues were about to board a flight when the attack occurred.
  • One crew member was injured during the incident.
  • UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres condemned the attack and called for respect for international law.
  • Airstrikes by the Israeli Air Force targeted Houthi military infrastructure in Yemen, including the airport.
“Our mission to negotiate the release of UN staff detainees and to assess the health and humanitarian situation in Yemen concluded today… At least two people were reported killed at the airport.” - Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus

This tragic event highlights the precarious situation in Yemen, where conflict continues to pose significant threats to civilians and humanitarian missions.

item.title: Zoho CEO Sridhar Vembu reignites 70-hour work week debate, asks should we work to demographic suicide? His answer is... | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Zoho CEO Sridhar Vembu reignites 70-hour work week debate, asks should we work to demographic suicide? His answer is...

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Live Mint

In a recent post, Zoho CEO Sridhar Vembu revisited the contentious 70-hour work week debate, questioning its necessity for economic development and the impact of such work culture on demographics.

The rationale behind the 70 hour work week is "it is necessary for economic development". If you look at East Asia - Japan, South Korea, Taiwan and China have all developed through extreme hard work, often imposing punitive levels of work on their own people.

Key Points:

  • Vembu argues that extreme work hours may not be necessary for economic growth.
  • He points out low birth rates in East Asian countries that prioritize hard work.
  • Questions the viability of success at the expense of personal well-being.
  • Calls for a balance between hard work and personal life.

item.title: The Hindu Morning Digest, December 27, 2024 - The Hindu
item.description:
Manmohan Singh, gentleman politician who opened up India’s economy in 1991, passes away

Date: December 27, 2024 Source: The Hindu

Former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh passed away late on Thursday, December 26, 2024, at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences. He was 92 years old and had recently retired as a member of the Rajya Sabha.

  • Singh represented Assam in the Upper House for six terms since 1991.
  • The Finance Ministry stated that the central bank's monetary policy stance may have contributed to a slowdown in demand.
  • The BJP received ₹2,604 crore in donations in 2023-24, which is nine times more than the Congress's ₹281 crore.
  • China's Defence Ministry confirmed the comprehensive implementation of an agreement to resolve the Ladakh standoff.
  • VHP leader commented that many temple-mosque disputes could have been avoided if Hindus had Mathura and Kashi.
  • Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge criticized PM Modi for not acknowledging insulting remarks made about Dr. Ambedkar.
  • The Election Commission reported over 10.58 lakh votes were not counted or rejected in the recent Lok Sabha election.
  • Bapsi Sidhwa, a renowned novelist, passed away at the age of 86 in Houston, U.S.
  • A PIL was filed in the Supreme Court to abolish the TDS system for being arbitrary and a violation of rights.
  • A Delhi tutor was arrested for inciting protests by civil service aspirants in Patna.
  • Five Palestinian journalists were killed in an Israeli strike in Gaza.
  • North India continues to experience severe cold wave conditions, with no snow in popular tourist destinations.
  • Intermittent rains are expected in parts of northern Tamil Nadu due to a weakened weather system over the Bay of Bengal.
  • Indian women’s cricket team aims for a clean sweep against West Indies in the final ODI.

Published - December 27, 2024 06:13 am IST

item.title: Indian cricketers wear black armbands on Day 2 in Melbourne to honour former PM Manmohan Singh - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Indian cricketers wear black armbands on Day 2 to honour former PM Manmohan Singh

Publication Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Indian cricket team honored former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh by wearing black armbands during Day 2 of the fourth Test against Australia in Melbourne. Singh passed away at the age of 92 on December 26, 2024, following health complications.

  • Players wore black armbands as a mark of respect.
  • Manmohan Singh died due to sudden health issues after being hospitalized.
  • He served as Prime Minister of India for 10 years and was known for his integrity.
“Resuscitative measures were started immediately at home. He was brought to the Medical Emergency at 8:06 p.m., but despite all efforts, he could not be revived and was declared dead at 9:51 p.m.”

Singh was regarded as one of India's longest-serving Prime Ministers and a significant political figure.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 27, 2024 advices family planning - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 27, 2024

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The daily horoscope for Pisces advises caution in spending and investments, with a focus on family planning, particularly for married women.

  • Be cautious about expenditures and avoid stock investments.
  • Minor productivity issues will arise but won't affect overall performance.
  • Today is favorable for love and relationships, with the potential for romance or reconciliation.
  • Professionals might face minor challenges in their business but are expected to achieve their goals with hard work.
  • Health issues may pose challenges, particularly for older individuals and children.
“Married female natives can seriously think about starting a family today.”

In conclusion, the horoscope today emphasizes careful planning in both personal and financial matters, while encouraging nurturing relationships.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim might use completely new camera technology for better periscope zoom - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim might use completely new camera technology for better periscope zoom

Publication Date: Not specified. Source: Not specified.

Samsung's new camera technology for the Galaxy S25 Slim promises significant improvements, reducing the periscope module's length by 22% while enhancing picture quality.

  • Camera module length reduced by 22% and height decreased, resulting in a smaller camera bump.
  • Improved brightness and an f/2.58 aperture at an equivalent focal length of 80mm.
  • Samsung forecasts sales of 3 million Galaxy S25 Slim units, lower than the anticipated 37 million for other S25 variants.
"Those expecting a decline in picture quality will also be pleasantly surprised."

This new technology may attract consumers looking for slim smartphones with advanced camera capabilities.

item.title: Beyonce’s eight-figure paycheck for NFL halftime Christmas show revealed - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Beyonce dazzles at NFL halftime show, performing Cowboy Carter with special guests.

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Beyonce delivered a stunning performance during the NFL halftime show at the Christmas Day game, showcasing her album, Cowboy Carter, with cameos from Post Malone and Shaboozey. Her paycheck for the performance was reported to be $20 million.

  • Beyonce performed live with special guests at the NFL halftime show.
  • Her performance included riding a white horse and a collaboration with her daughter, Blue Ivy Carter.
  • The reported amount for her performance was $20 million.
  • Beyonce's performance sets a high bar for future Super Bowl halftime shows.
Beyonce’s performance instantly won the hearts of the crowd.

The performance was both captivating and lucrative, reinforcing Beyonce's status as a leading entertainer in high-profile events.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Sara Arfeen Khan and Kashish Kapoor accuse makers of biasedness, feel the 'Adaalat' task wa - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Sara Arfeen Khan and Kashish Kapoor accuse makers of biasedness, feel the 'Adaalat' task was done to support a contestant; say 'This was all created to lift someone'

Publication Date: October 24, 2023 Source: Times of India

In the latest developments in Bigg Boss 18, contestants Sara Arfeen Khan and Kashish Kapoor have voiced their concerns regarding the perceived bias of the show’s makers, particularly in relation to a recent task that they believe was structured to benefit a specific contestant.

  • Sara and Kashish claim that the 'Adaalat' task unfairly favored one contestant over others.
  • They feel that this created an unlevel playing field, affecting the competition.
  • Statements made by the contestants included strong accusations of orchestrating events for personal gain.
'This was all created to lift someone,' said Sara Arfeen Khan, expressing her frustration over the task.

The accusations have sparked a discussion among fans about the fairness and integrity of the competition, raising questions about the production choices behind the scenes.

RBI Policies May Have Contributed to Economic Slowdown, Says Finance Ministry

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: [Insert Source]

The Finance Ministry has stated that certain policies of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) may have played a role in the ongoing economic slowdown in the country.

  • The Finance Ministry highlights potential negative impacts of RBI's policies.
  • Concerns raised regarding the broader economic ramifications.

“The policies implemented by the RBI need careful reconsideration to mitigate adverse economic effects.”

item.title: Govinda's wife Sunita Ahuja says 'we use abusive language with each other': 'Aaj tak bhi nahi lagta ki hu - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sunita Ahuja on Her Unique Relationship with Govinda: 'We Use Abusive Language with Each Other'

Publication Date: [Not specified]

Source: Times of India

Sunita Ahuja candidly discusses her unconventional marriage with Govinda, revealing that their dynamic often feels more like a friendship than a traditional husband-wife relationship.

  • Sunita refers to Govinda affectionately as 'abeey' and admits their playful exchanges often involve light-hearted insults.
  • She humorously questioned the nature of their relationship, stating, 'I still can't believe you're my husband.'
  • Sunita explained her adaptation to Govinda’s family preferences, recalling her shift from miniskirts to sarees to please his mother.
  • Govinda recently celebrated his 61st birthday by interacting with fans.
  • Earlier this year, Govinda faced an incident where he accidentally shot himself in the leg at home.
'I was getting ready to leave for a show in Kolkata. It was around 4:45-5:00 AM when the revolver fell and misfired. I felt a jhatka (shock) and then noticed… there was a fountain (of blood).' - Govinda

Sunita's openness about her marriage reflects a modern take on relationships, showcasing that love can manifest in various forms.

item.title: Sneak peek into Ivanka Trump's chic Christmas Eve at Mar-a-Lago with DJ Donald Trump - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ivanka Trump's Chic Christmas Eve Celebration at Mar-a-Lago with DJ Donald Trump

Publication Date: Dec 27, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Ivanka Trump celebrated Christmas Eve at Mar-a-Lago with her family while her father, Donald Trump, performed as the DJ. The celebration included festive music and a glamorous family presence.

  • Ivanka wore a stunning black dress with a white flower print.
  • Donald Trump played a variety of songs, including holiday classics.
  • The entry price for the event was $350 per ticket.
  • Guests included Ivanka Trump's husband Jared Kushner and their three children.
  • Notably absent were other family members like Don Jr. and Eric Trump.
“The president played a serious set and was very into the music.” - Source

The event was marked by a festive atmosphere, a limited number of guests, and an affectionate moment between Ivanka and her father.

item.title: CA Final Result Nov 2024 Declared at icai.nic.in, Check Top Rank Holders, Passing Percentage Here - Times Now
item.description:
CA Final Result Nov 2024 Declared at ICAI: Check Top Rank Holders and Passing Percentage

Publication Date: December 26, 2024

Source: ICAI

The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India has announced the CA Final Result for November 2024. Candidates who appeared can now download their individual scorecards and merit lists from the official ICAI website.

Key Points

  • The CA final examination was conducted in two groups in November 2024.
  • Top rank holders include Heramb Maheshwari and Rishab Ostwal, both scoring 84.86%.
  • The pass percentage is based on candidates scoring at least 40% in each exam and a minimum of 50% overall.

Top Rank Holders

  • 1) Heramb Maheshwari (84.86%) - Hyderabad - 508 marks
  • 1) Rishab Ostwal R (84.86%) - Tirupati - 508 marks
  • 2) Riya Kunjankumar Shah (83.50%) - Ahmedabad - 501 marks
  • 3) Kinjal Ajmera (82.17%) - Kolkata - 493 marks

Conclusion

The announcement of the CA Final Result 2024 is a critical milestone for candidates, marking their progress into the professional realm of Chartered Accountancy.

item.title: CA Final Result Nov 2024 Declared at icai.org, Get Merit List PDF, Passing Percentage Here - Times Now
item.description:
CA Final Result Nov 2024 Declared

Publication Date: December 26, 2024
Source: Times Now

The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India has announced the CA final result for November 2024 today. Candidates can download their scorecards on the official ICAI website.

Key Points:

  • Final examination for Group 1 was conducted on November 3, 5, and 7, and Group 2 on November 9, 11, and 13, 2024.
  • Top rank holders include:
    • Heramb Maheshwari (84.86%) from Hyderabad, scored 508 marks.
    • Rishab Ostwal R (84.86%) from Tirupati, scored 508 marks.
    • Riya Kunjankumar Shah (83.50%) from Ahmedabad, scored 501 marks.
    • Kinjal Ajmera (82.17%) from Kolkata, scored 493 marks.
  • Minimum qualifying criteria: at least 40% in each exam/paper and 50% overall to qualify.

How to Check CA Final Result Nov 2024:

  1. Visit icai.org
  2. Click on CA Final Result 2024 link on the homepage
  3. Submit your login credentials
  4. CA Final Result 2024 will appear on the screen
  5. View and download your scorecard
  6. Keep it safe for future reference

CA Final Result Nov 2024 Pass Percentage

ICAI also releases the overall pass percentage along with results, outlining the criteria for candidates.

For more updates, visit the official website of ICAI.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Suffers Over 55% Drop Post Christmas, Varun Dhawan’s Film Is In Alarming Situation! - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Suffers Over 55% Drop Post Christmas, Varun Dhawan’s Film Is

Publication Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Koimoi

The action thriller Baby John, led by Varun Dhawan, faced a disappointing downturn in box office collections after a promising opening. Despite expectations, the film struggled against competition and mixed reviews.

Key Points:

  • Day 1 box office: 11.25 crores
  • Day 2 early estimates: 4-5 crores
  • Overall collection for two days: 15.25-16.25 crores
  • Film’s release coincided with the successful Pushpa 2
  • Daily drop in revenue between 55-64% indicating poor audience reception
"The mixed word-of-mouth is visibly impacting the footfall, and the film will soon crash if it does not maintain its hold tomorrow."

Overall, Baby John has not met the expected box office performance, raising concerns for its future runs amidst stiff competition.
